resources.string:
Hi, my name is Brener. 
I’m a Software Developer with three years of experience. In my career, I’ve been working developing new features for great brands of e-commerce, like Electrolux and Ambev. Currently, I’m working at XP Inc. It’s my first time in a company in the financial market, and it’s been such a good experience. I’m learning a lot and I’ve met amazing people. 
I have solid knowledge of front-end development and its most popular technologies: React, JavaScript, Next, Typescript. Besides that, I’m a communicative and collaborative person that is always willing to help. 
Reach out my LinkedIn and GitHub profile if you want to know more about me.
